H0.text: Nucleus must be present in order for something to be classified as an organism.

H1.text: An organ is required for something to be classified as an organism.

H2.text: A cell must be present for something to be classified as an organism.

H3.text: An organelle must be present for something to be classified as an organism.

A5.text: Cell theory ... states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells.
